sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { DataContext } from './Componets/DataProvider' import './payment.css'; export default function Payment() { const value = useContext(DataContext) const [cart] = value.cart const [total, setTotal] = useState(0) const [products] = value.products useEffect(() => { const getTotal = () => { const res = cart.reduce((prev, item) => { return prev + (item.price * item.count) }, 0) setTotal(res) } getTotal() }, [cart]) return ( cart.map(product => (

{product.title}

)),

Billing address

Please enter your First Name.
Please enter your shipping address.
Your username is required.
Please enter your shipping address.
Zip code required.

Payment

Full name as displayed on card
Name on card is required
Credit card number is required
Expiration date required
Security code required

Your cart

  • Product name{products.title}
    Brief description
    $12
  • Total= USD${total}
) }
